name: Darin Van Ryswyk
text: This is a horribly operated store with unhelpful staff.  We were in Iowa City for a youth event and the kids decided to eat at Blaze. The menu board showed an option of a half pizza with a salad. The salad listed on the board was a fresh ‚Ä¶More

name: John S Mckee
text: Loved this place. Build your own pizza with lots of options cant be beat. Your order is done really fast which is a big bonus. Even their root beer was awesome. This is my new favorite pizza place !

name: Alyssa Conrad
text: The pizza here is so good! You can customize the pizza so it's everything you've ever dreamed of. They have tons of options for cheese, toppings, and even flavors to drizzle on top. I've been during non-rush hours, and it takes probably 10 ‚Ä¶More

name: Jordan Burtch
text: Amazing pizza experience! I had so many options and my pizza was perfectly cooked. I love the keto crust option.

name: Keith Shields
text: First time at Blaze Pizza.  Staff was helpful and friendly.  Pepperoni and mushroom pizza was very good!

name: Sara Anson
text: We like the pizza but the staff comes off as unfriendly and annoyed when we come in to order. And more often than not our pizzas come out burnt.

name: Lee Rabe
text: Love the pizza, but it now appears to be permanently closed.

name: Jennifer Bertrand
text: This location is permanently closed. Google won't mark it as such for some reason.

name: Josh Lemon
text: Pizza is good. Had to eat my salad with two knives using them like chopsticks because they didn't have forks.

name: Carissa Alvarez
text: Ate at Blaze Pizza for the very first time today. Service was friendly and quick. Pizza was delicious. I got a Veg Out with onions, mushrooms and squash.

name: Mr. Hayes
text: Fast and delicious my daughter and I split a pizza we loved it. Definitely will eat it again

name: Shorty Trochez
text: Such a cool spot in the downtown area. Beer on tap and awesome pizza.

name: Natalie Averkamp
text: Love this place! Great if you want a step above chain pizza without the wait of restaurant pizza. Lots of great topping options, delicious crust, and they have vegan cheese available! Been here several times and staff have always been kind and efficient.

name: C. Hartwick
text: Great place to eat! Delicious pizza that's quick and not too expensive.

name: Caleb Calkins
text: Plenty of staff, short line, but the restaurant was so gross . Floor so dirty, hope I don't get sick . 2 stars :(

name: Elizabeth K.
text: Your pizza here is limitless. You can get a signature creation or make your own. When you make your own, you can add as much cheese, meat, toppings as you want so that the pizza is perfect for you. They also have an app so that you can ‚Ä¶More

name: Jessie Whitmer
text: Excellent pizza! Quick friendly service.

name: J
text: It‚Äôs always great! I asked for extra crispy and I got it!

name: Matthew J
text: Poor management. Experienced extremely poor customer service with the manager on duty during my visit.

name: Jeremy Meyers
text: Love the option to build my own pizza! The food is delicious and the staff is friendly and outgoing. They also have a great variety of drinks that aren't pop. (Various flavors of lemonade type drinks).

name: Dan B
text: From pre-planned pizzas to create your own this place has all you're looking for. Brick Oven Fired Pizza cool beverage selection. It's the best chain pizza place in town.

name: Billy Claywell
text: Blaze is like a Subway for pizza only better.   Customers choose their toppings as they watch their pizza go down the line .  We had the Keto "bread" and it was delicious.   The grandkids enjoyed table shuffleboard while they waited. A good meal,  family fun at a fair price.

name: Kuann K. Fawkes
text: If you are drunk and in need of a quick bite, this is the place to be. Main tip is to ask the pizza makers to leave the pizza in the oven longer, otherwise your pizza will come out doughy in the middle and slightly undercook. If that's what you're into, awesome, if not ask for more time.

name: Damn Juhl
text: Consistent pizza with all the toppings you could want in a fast no pressure format. I like to get it to go.

name: Shaun Hawkins
text: My sister always leaves CR to visit here and I wondered what was so great about it, had her bring me home a pizza and now I know.. the pizza is minimum 5X better than anything I've ever had! Great Pizza 1.21 Gigawatts!

name: Sabrina Spikes
text: This blaze is very fast and does a great job. They recently added vegan chorizo and vegan cheese to their menu as well. They will put on any extra toppings you want free of charge. If you get the blaze app, they have great offers for Bogo ‚Ä¶More

name: Justin Hulsizer
text: Best pizza I have ever ate in my life

name: Amelia Akers
text: I love the crust! Great toppings and love the wood fire grill. You can barely hear the staff when they talk so I'd suggest ordering online. It's a nice store and they keep it clean üëå

name: Donald Burch
text: It was amazing. First time in. Great people. 180seconds to get a cooked pizza was mind blowing. And the blood orange lemonade was amazing.

name: shawn knepp
text: Unique and fun pizzeria in iowa city. Not like the standard pizzas you get at other places.

name: Alex Steele
text: I‚Äôve always been impressed by Blaze! The workers are super friendly and help put together your order really well. The pizza is also excellent...I‚Äôve never had a bad piece. Their ingredients are always fresh. I look forward to eating there all the time.

text: Very roomy and a decent amount of food for the price. The pizza has to be eaten with a fork, but is p delicious. Beer is available in cans. Shuffle board as well!

name: Glorianne Dorce
text: The location is convenient if you use public transportation. Additionally building your own pizza makes you feel like a kid again. Also the waiting period is not long.

name: Matt Weber
text: Delicious handmade pizza you can watch as they create the pizza from scratch, step by step and watch it get cooked in a brick fired oven. I've eaten here many times. They never disappoint.

name: Cynthia Fischer
text: They have a gluten free crust and it is very good. Their staff is always friendly and professional. Always a good time at Blaze.

name: Ryan Ceynar
text: Cool hip place with seating available. Pizzas are delicious with so many options to put on them, they cook in about 3 minutes. One pizza is just about perfect size for one person. Pizza cost ranges from about 6-9 dollars.

text: Good pizza i like it. They variety of signature thin crust pizzas and unique drinks. Cozy with darker lighting atmosphere. Orderd meat lovers and green strips was good.

text: Excellent fast food pizza. The service is great.

name: Hassan Rafique
text: Great thin crust pizza! The variety of toppings and cheese options are just remarkable. Chicken BBQ is the best I've ever had of the kind. It's light and delicious! Making your own pizza at such a nominal price is a steal! Highly recommended!

name: Michael
text: Pizza is decent, and the atmosphere is nice. It's better than the big chains, but it's not as "gourmet" as other places. We haven't gone back, but would consider it if we were in the area again.

name: PHILLIP KILCREASE
text: Blaze is an inexpensive Build Your Own pizza shop. Having visited them before in Chicago, I now have them in Iowa City!! Yeah!!

On a recent trip to Iowa we wanted to stop on our way home and my uncle actually turnes around after driving 20 minutes last it bc he didn't want to miss out on the pizza
